title: Larger, Woodlake 1 BR Unit!  Newly Updated!  Quiet!
posting_body: One of Woodlake's larger 1 BR/ 1 BA floor plans, with pretty courtyard view and double pane windows, creating a comfortable environment for stay-at-home work.
This quiet one bedroom unit with balcony features: PVC plank flooring; white shaker style kitchen cabinets, quartz countertops; custom vanity; dishwasher and microwave.

Also includes: bathroom; stove; walk-in closet; an adjacent swimming pool; an extra storage room; convenient same floor laundry facility; 24 hour security; elevators; and a prime assigned covered parking spot.
Woodlake's central setting on the Peninsula is ideally situated for commute/ leisure access: 20 minutes to San Francisco; 8 minutes to SFO and BART; and walking distance to Coyote Pt.
Beautifully landscaped grounds surround a meandering lake.
Five (5) area pools are located in private courtyards, with a 6th, main pool, serving as a focal point for many organized events and barbeques.
The property also features free access to large modern gym, clubhouse, tennis courts, sauna, a billiard room and 18 hole putting green.
Terms: 1 year lease, tenant responsible for electricity only; $45 nonrefundable application fee per adult occupant.
Inviting those with excellent credit to apply.
